entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:48 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 05:26 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain or drizzle this morning. Showers beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
